activities: Giant media collects certain personal information that users choose to share on their social media pages. Personal information is only collected when it is freely given by the user. With permission, that information may be shared with clients in order for the clients to determine what kind of users are viewing and sharing their content. Any user may opt out of Giant Media's information collecting and sharing program by emailing us at support@giantmedia.com.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Cooperation with the EU Data Protection Authorities
